title: Conspirators
overview: Conspirators follows a group of friends seven years after high school working for a local politician, Hudson, running for mayor. After running into an old friend, "The Gang" must uncover the truth about his shooting and disappearance, uncovering the truth about Hudson in the process. These secrets may lead to Hudson dropping out of the race, and more than likely to his arrest; however, with only partial information on the flash drive, the group doesn't know what to believe. They have to find out the truth and decide whether to help Hudson or take him down with all of his government counterparts in the biggest hack they've ever pulled.
